content: Patient 88734-AT5 (DOB 04/15/1968) underwent bilateral knee replacement at Seaview Surgical Center on 02/22/2024 under Policy OP-9924. Post-op care included six weeks of aquatic therapy at Tidepool Rehabilitation. The claim initially denied due to missing prior authorization, but was reprocessed after Mariner's Point Orthopedics submitted supplemental documentation on 03/05/2024.
